CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 26 reads: " Thousands Thrilled at Courier Home Service Fair...12. Robert French, local sales representative for Seagram's Distillers, is flanked by, left to right, Charles W. King, division branch manager; Albert Pierce, state manager, and Capt. Mal Wahnowsky, division representative, in the fabulous Seagram's Seven booth...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Charles W. King, Albert Pierce, Robert "Bob" P. French Jr., and Capt. Mal Wahnowsky, standing in Seagrams booth in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
